nodes.title: ‚ú® Positive
widgets_values: A highly detailed, cinematic portrait of a young woman standing confidently against a softly blurred urban backdrop at twilight, captured from a low-angle perspective emphasizing her full height (5'8") and elegant proportions with balanced facial features. She faces the camera directly with a subtle, serene smile, head slightly tilted to her right, left hand resting gently on her hip while her right arm hangs naturally by her side. Her outfit consists of a tailored ivory silk blouse with delicate lace trim at the cuffs and collar, paired with high-waisted black wool trousers featuring a subtle pinstripe pattern; she wears minimalist gold hoop earrings and polished nude pumps. The lighting is soft, diffused Rembrandt lighting from the left at 30¬∞ angle, casting gentle shadows on her right cheekbone while illuminating her hair's natural wave texture with warm amber tones; ambient city glow creates a subtle lens flare effect in the upper-left corner. Shot with an 85mm prime lens at f/1.8 for shallow depth of field, showcasing crisp skin texture and fabric details against a bokeh background of muted teal building facades and distant streetlights. Style: Photorealistic film photography with Kodak Portra 400 grain emulation, natural skin tones, and cinematic color grading emphasizing cool blues in shadows versus warm golds in highlights. Maintain exact pose symmetry, outfit material textures (silk sheen on blouse, wool nap on trousers), and lighting physics as depicted.

nodes.title: base
widgets_values: a cute puppy kung fu master, one leg in the air

nodes.title: role
widgets_values: Your're my experienced z-image-turbo prompt specialist. Analyze the image and rewrite it as a long detailed prompt

nodes.title: rules
widgets_values:
Rules:
- DO NOT include the original character
- Focus only on transferring the visual style
- Match the same level of detail, finish and artistic qualities

nodes.title: output
widgets_values: Output only the final long image prompt

nodes.title: instruct
widgets_values: Keep the same pose, outfit, proportions, lighting, camera angle and style

nodes.title: prompt
widgets_values: Output only the final long image prompt

nodes.title: system
widgets_values: enhance the prompt. Leave out everything that's irritating or misleading (first in wins). just provide the prompt

nodes.title: ‚ú® prompt+
widgets_values: A fluffy, orange-furred bunny clad in a white martial arts gi leaps through the air above a traditional Japanese dojo, one hind leg suspended mid-jump in a pose of explosive power, its black eyes wide with focus. The scene is bathed in golden-hour light spilling from a slanted sky, casting long, dramatic shadows across the tatami mat and a weathered wooden training post in the foreground. The bunny‚Äôs fur glistens with faint dew, contrasting against the stark, cool tones of the stone pathway and the deep reds of a dragon-scale patterned rug in the background. Its leap is framed by a low archway carved with kung fu symbols, the air thick with the scent of incense and sweat. The midground reveals a cluster of tiny, wind-blacked mushrooms and a single flickering lantern, its glow illuminating the bunny‚Äôs taut muscles as it balances on one leg, a fist raised in a striking pose, the other arm stretching toward the viewer like a wild, untamed force. The composition is tight, with the bunny‚Äôs face and outstretched hand as the focal impact
